Text saved: Dreams, which are pictures or stories that our mind creates while we sleep, may be the result of our mind sorting the thoughts we have during the day. When we are awake, our thoughts usually appear in our mind as words, like a conversation we have with ourselves. When we are asleep, the part of our brain that controls language becomes less active, while the part that controls emotions becomes more active.
